teo.isgci.problem

Class Recognition

  • java.lang.Object
    • teo.isgci.problem.Problem
      • teo.isgci.problem.Recognition

  • public class Recognition
extends Problem
    Stores information about recognizing a graph.

    • Method Detail

      • distributeAlgorithms

        protected void distributeAlgorithms()
        Distribute the Algorithms for this problem over all nodes. initAlgo/addAlgo must have been called for all problems. We must redefine this function because Recognition distributes neither upwards nor downwards. Assumes the graph g is transitively closed!
        Overrides:
        distributeAlgorithms in class Problem

      • distributeUpUnion

        protected void distributeUpUnion()
        Try moving complexity information UP to union nodes. We only change the complexity class for Union nodes, and do not generate new references or timebounds. The reasoning is: If we can recognize every part of the union in polytime/lin, then we can take the disjunction of their results in polytime/lin as well. So the union is recognizable in polytime/lin.
        Overrides:
        distributeUpUnion in class Problem

      • distributeDownIntersect

        protected void distributeDownIntersect()
        Try moving complexity information DOWN to intersection nodes. We only change the complexity class for Intersect nodes, and do not generate new references or timebounds. The reasoning is: If we can recognize every part of the intersection in polytime/lin, then we can take their conjunction in polytime/lin as well.
        Overrides:
        distributeDownIntersect in class Problem
